if anyone is confused about what the 3d part of this is here is it explaind
this file as been ripped as you would see it on a NON 3D TV which is 2 images.
what the user has to do if they have a 3d tv is MANUALY change the 3D setting to SIDE BY SIDE of the TV there is no data in the file to automaticly change it to 3d like most 3d content that come on dvd/blu-ray
